description: The salaries in the eastern parts of the Czech Republic are even worse than in Prague. The guy from today came from Brno - it´s the biggest city there in Moravia. And that´s a long way to travel just for a job-interview. But he was more than eager to re-locate. So I supposed him from the very beginning to be open-minded towards my little, evil offer. But let me start right from the beginning: he worked as a gardener before. After then he worked as a truck-driver. Hard to imagine when I saw his juvenile face. But however, right now he was unemployed. Bingo. And indeed it was an easy task to make him strip and suck. He had very nice and soft skin. It was funny to see how hard he tried to please me just in order to get the job. But watch it yourself :-)
title: Dirty Scout 14
